title: Red Deer Hunt
description: Hunt trophy Red Deer in the majestic Canterbury Highlands. Package includes lodge accommodation, experienced guide, and field preparation of trophies.

title: Himalayan Tahr Hunt
description: Challenge yourself with a hunt for the elusive Himalayan Tahr in rugged alpine terrain. access to remote hunting spots included.

title: Chamois Hunt
description: Experience the thrill of hunting Chamois in New Zealand's alpine terrain. Perfect for hunters seeking a challenging mountain hunting experience.
